We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RegressionChannel _rc;
// In Initialize()
_rc = RC(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_rc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Linear Regression", _rc.LinearRegression);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Upper Channel", _rc.UpperChannel);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Lower Channel", _rc.LowerChannel);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Intercept", _rc.Intercept);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Slope", _rc.Slope);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RC Current", _rc.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.rc = self.RC(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.rc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Linear Regression", self.rc.LinearRegression);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Upper Channel", self.rc.UpperChannel);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Lower Channel", self.rc.LowerChannel);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Intercept", self.rc.Intercept);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Slope", self.rc.Slope);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RC Current", self.rc.Current);
